title: Wout is Back! Van Aert Returns in Norway, Without Guarantee of Tour de France
content:
Van Aert will race for the first time in eight weeks at the four-day Tour of Norway, with a possible Tour de France start hanging in balance: 'I'm not in the best shape.'

Read the full article at Wout is Back! Van Aert Returns in Norway, Without Guarantee of Tour de France on Velo.
author: ahood
